member.summary: Provides the Draw method for rendering fields. [0.18.0]

member.name: M:UnityModManagerNet.IDrawable.OnChange
member.summary: Called when values change. For sliders it is called too often.

member.name: T:UnityModManagerNet.DrawFieldsAttribute
member.summary: Specifies which fields to render. By default only with attribute Draw. [0.18.0]

member.name: F:UnityModManagerNet.DrawAttribute.Type
member.summary: Specifies which GUI element to render with. By default Auto.

member.name: F:UnityModManagerNet.DrawAttribute.Label
member.summary: Either this or the field name is displayed.

member.name: F:UnityModManagerNet.DrawAttribute.Width
member.summary: Applies to elements such as sliders, text fields, etc.

member.name: F:UnityModManagerNet.DrawAttribute.Height
member.summary: Applies to elements such as sliders, text fields, etc.

member.name: F:UnityModManagerNet.DrawAttribute.Min
member.summary: Minimum allowed number for sliders and fields.

member.name: F:UnityModManagerNet.DrawAttribute.Max
member.summary: Maximum allowed number for sliders and fields.

member.name: F:UnityModManagerNet.DrawAttribute.Precision
member.summary: Rounds a double-precision floating-point value to a specified number of fractional digits, and rounds midpoint values to the nearest even number. Default 2

member.name: F:UnityModManagerNet.DrawAttribute.VisibleOn
member.summary: Becomes visible if the field value matches. Use format "FieldName|Value". Supports only string, primitive and enum types.

member.name: F:UnityModManagerNet.DrawAttribute.InvisibleOn
member.summary: Becomes invisible if the field value matches. Use format "FieldName|Value". Supports only string, primitive and enum types.

member.name: F:UnityModManagerNet.DrawAttribute.Box
member.summary: Applies vertical box style to the container.

member.name: F:UnityModManagerNet.DrawAttribute.Collapsible
member.summary: Applies spoiler style to the container.

member.name: F:UnityModManagerNet.DrawAttribute.Vertical
member.summary: Applies vertical or horizontal style to the field.

member.name: F:UnityModManagerNet.DrawAttribute.NoFlexibleSpace
member.summary: Some elements use FlexibleSpace for alignment. This option will disable it. [0.29.0]

member.name: T:UnityModManagerNet.HorizontalAttribute
member.summary: Wraps container in GUILayout.BeginHorizontal() and GUILayout.EndHorizontal(). [0.22.14]

member.name: T:UnityModManagerNet.DrawBeginHorizontalAttribute
member.summary: Inserts GUILayout.BeginHorizontal() and spaces before any GUI keeping order. [0.29.0]

member.name: T:UnityModManagerNet.DrawEndHorizontalAttribute
member.summary: Inserts spaces and GUILayout.EndHorizontal() after any GUI keeping order. [0.29.0]

member.name: T:UnityModManagerNet.DrawBeginVerticalAttribute
member.summary: Inserts GUILayout.BeginVertical() and spaces before any GUI keeping order. [0.29.0]

member.name: T:UnityModManagerNet.DrawEndVerticalAttribute
member.summary: Inserts spaces and GUILayout.EndVertical() after any GUI keeping order. [0.29.0]
